item.name: USERS

request.description: Login for admins.

!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - ADMIN

Creates a new admin user (register).
Login for admins.

!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - ADMIN

Check if user is admin, returns property "isAdmin".
Login for admins.

!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - ADMIN

Get all the users and their data.

!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - ADMIN

Updates "name" and "email" from a specified Admin ("_id").
Login for admins.
Retreive an specific administrator from DB by using its ObjectID

request.description:
!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - ADMIN

Deletes a specified Admin (_id).
Creates a new regular user.
Login for regular users.

!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - REGULAR USERS

Updates "name", "email" and "phone" from current user. (Token has the reference to this user)

!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - REGULAR USERS

Updates "password" from current user. (Token has the reference to this user)
Login for regular users.

item.description:
This collection has ADMIN and USERS.

CRUD of all users. Some are restricted by token. (see the lock next to the enpoint name)

request.description: Get all available products.

Get products in page.


First parameter: total items to get

Second: Page number

!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - ADMIN

Gets all products, including the ones that were deleted logically.

request.description:
!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - ADMIN

Creates a new product.
Get all data from single product.

!BEARER TOKEN REQUIRED - ADMIN

Updates "available", "name", "description", "shippable", "price", "stock" and "image" from a specified product ("_id").
If cart doesn't exists CREATES cart, if it does then it UPDATES

response.name: BAD_REQUEST
response.body:
{
    "data": [],
    "message": "BAD_REQUEST: 'items' is a required property

Failed validating 'required' in schema:
    {'properties': {'items': {'price': {'type': 'number'},
                              'product_id': {'type': 'string'},
                              'quantity': {'type': 'number'},
                              'type': 'array'},
                    'user': {'type': 'string'}},
     'required': ['items'],
     'type': 'object'}

On instance:
    {}",
    "status": false
}

request.description: Gets cart
To use with cart, to fetch aditional data of each product in cart.

response.name: Invalid JSON body
response.body:
{
  "data": [],
  "message": "BAD_REQUEST: '_ids' is a required property

Failed validating 'required' in schema:
    {'properties': {'_ids': {'items': {'type': 'string'}, 'type': 'array'}},
     'required': ['_ids'],
     'type': 'object'}

On instance:
    {'gives': 'an error', 'not': 'a correct format'}",
  "status": false
}

response.name: Mixed valid and invalid _ids
